Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Correctly \Cor*rect"ly\ (k?r-r?kt"l?), adv. In a correct manner; exactly; acurately; without fault or error. [1913 Webster]
correctly adv : in a correct manner; "he guessed right" [syn: {right}, {aright}] [ant: {incorrectly}, {incorrectly}]
